Class MemoryFieldsIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.Index

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, UpdatableIndex, WritableIndex

    public class MemoryFieldsIndex
extends MemoryFields
    An in-memory incremental fields index (non-compressed).
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Stuart Mackie
